title: Stuck on authenticating or trying to reconnect
body:
As title say i'm always having problems with that. 
please tell me a solution.
it's not a connection problem.
Repair tool don't work.
When it's not stuck it say try to reconnect.
Then after some attempt usually it work.

replies.body: It's possible that your firewalls or antivirus are blocking your network from being able to reach those login servers. Be sure to update those with exceptions using [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3), but you could also just try temporarily disabling them to see if that lets you in.
